item.title: CraveProject Website Launched!
item.dc:creator: CRAVE Community
item.description: Now under new leadership, we have been working for a bit to relaunch the old MyCrave.org website, rebranded as CraveProject. This is basically a community created and supported website. Please feel free […]
item.content:encoded:
Now under new leadership, we have been working for a bit to relaunch the old MyCrave.org website, rebranded as CraveProject. This is basically a community created and supported website. Please feel free to ask any questions, report bugs etc. to help.crave@gmail.com

We also need your help funding the project and website. All help is needed and much appreciated.

Donate to site development: BxDuD7fEWE3g8BhnUc7YKEzDHL5ViggYES (CRAVE) | 18dexhxHy9rwikGLJbM8kc8zfmHbBHSfz3 (BTC)

Donate to coin development: Bx3X5LSJwCYW7waZQExzgHhDC4ZdCku47p (CRAVE) | 1GjeqWFLc4TBDg3bwdQk9ZWnEoNPCT9t6G (BTC)

item.title: World’s First Official Sale with CRAVE
item.dc:creator: CRAVE Community
item.description: The first sale with CRAVE happened on 4th of June! CRAVE community member NEVER.SELL.CRAVE…EVER accepted CRAVE as payment in his phone technical service called KP SERVIS located at Czech […]
item.content:encoded:
The first sale with CRAVE happened on 4th of June! CRAVE community member NEVER.SELL.CRAVE....EVER accepted CRAVE as payment in his phone technical service called KP SERVIS located at Czech Republic. If you have any problems with your phone or if you want to buy shiny accessories and if you want to pay them with CRAVE you can visit KP SERVIS at their address:

KP SERVIS (name of company)
Chomutovska 11 (street)
Karlovy Vary (city)
Czech Republic (country)
36010 (postal code)
00420773615289 (cell phone number)
kpservis.kv@gmail.com  (official email)
